categories.name: Web
categories.description: Everything you need for REST endpoints, HTTP and web formats like JSON

categories.description: Accessing and managing your data (RDBMS, NoSQL, caching, transaction management, etc)

categories.description: Connectors to read to write from a skew of systems (file, S#, Twitter, etc)
